name: wwf-donations-plugin-sw6
description: npm configuration to fetch common wwf banner assets

scripts.build: cd "../../../../../assets" && npm run assemble && cd "../shopware/src/custom/plugins/WWFDonationPlugin" && shx mkdir -p images && shx cp -fr "../../../../../assets/dist/banner.css" . && shx cp -fr "../../../../../assets/dist/images/*" "images/"

author: EXXETA AG
